Author: Lucifurr
Name: Fun Fact Countdown
Changelog:
Nov 26, 2024
- Added dad mode

Nov 20, 2024
- Updated for 7.1
- Added 1,000 more fun facts

July 27, 2024
- Added the ability to choose a chat channel for the Fun Fact Countdown (default is Party)

July 24, 2024
- Fixed an issue where erroneous whitespace in the command call would cause a FormatException
- Fixed settings window sizing
- Added generic /ffcd command to open settings. Settings can now be adjusted: Use different sound effects, skip the "Starting fun fact countdown!" chat message and delay
Description:
Start a countdown that sends fun facts to your chat!
"/ffcd" to open the settings.

"/ffcd <length> <interval1> <interval2> ..." to begin the fun fact countdown.

For example, "/ffcd 15 10 5 0" will start a 15 second countdown and share a fun fact to your chosen chat channel (Party by default) at the 10 second, 5 second, and 0 second marks!

***If no intervals are given, your party will enjoy a fun fact for every second of the countdown.
